level.text: 103.1 The Chairperson of the Board shall preside at all meetings of the Boardt which he or she is present, and shall perform such other duties as may beequired of him or her by the Board.

103.4 Special meetings of the Board may be called at the discretion of thehairperson or at the request of any six (6) Members. At least forty-eight (48)ours in advance of each special meeting of the Board, notice shall be given toach Member and to the public.
